name: Shell Building Blocks
tagline: Supporting material for my 2014 PSU MacAdmins session
body:
### PSU MacAdmins 2014 - Shell Building Blocks
This repo contains supporting material for my "Shell Building Blocks" talk. In this repo, you'll find:

* extended talk notes
* annotated example scripts
* links to some of my favorite online resources for learning the shell
* images credits for my slide deck
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
